fromDocument.json:
swagger: '3.0'
info:
  title: Gift Aid Service
  version: 1.0.0
basePath: /api
schemes:
  - https
paths:
  /giftaid:
    get:
      summary: Get the amount of gift aid reclaimable for donation amount
      parameters:
        - in: query
          name: amount
          type: number
          required: true          
          miniumum: 2
          maximum: 100000            
          description: The Donation Amount
      produces:
        - application/json
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          schema:
            $ref: '#/definitions/GiftAidResponse'

  /giftaid/declarations:
    post:
        summary: Submits a gift aid declatation
        requestBody: 
            required: true
            content:
                application/json:
                schema:
                    $ref : '#/definitions/GiftAidDeclaration'
        produces:
            - applicaiton/json
        responses:
            '201':
                description: Created
                schema:
                    $ref : '#/definitions/GiftAidDeclarationResponse'
  
definitions:
  GiftAidResponse:
    type: object
    required:
      - donationAmount
      - giftAidAmount
    properties:
      donationAmount:
        type: number
      giftAidAmount: 
        type: number

  GiftAidDeclaration:
    type: object
    required:
      - name
      - postCode
      - donationAmount
    properties:
      name:
        type: string
      postCode: 
        type: string
      donationAmount: 
        type: number

  GiftAidDeclarationResponse:
    type: object
    required:
      - token    
      - giftAidAmount
    properties:
      token:
        type: string
      giftAidAmount: 
        type: number
